title: Fidelia. Newly corrected and augmented, by George Withers of Lincolnes Inne Gentleman
author: Wither, George, 1588-1667.
publisher: Printed by E[dward] G[riffin] for Thomas Walkley and are to be sold at his shop at the Eagle and Childe in Brittaines Burse,
notes: With a final colophon leaf; the last leaf is blank.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
